channel.title: Zerk3D Development Team. Recruting
channel.description:
Hello my name is Liam,We are currently constructing our server. we are always updating it to make it the best of what we can.
My Msn: liamflan06@hotmail.co.uk
What we need: Coder with me. Admin Mod Maybe another coder
Our goal is to have a good system and a succesful server
Name:_________ Contact: __________ AGE: _________ How Long you've been experience on how to do it:___________________________ Extra Info:_________________________________
If not enough ill post some more pics . :).

item.title: Zerk3D Development Team. Recruting
item.dc:creator: @amaarzzz amaarzzz
item.description:
@amaarzzz wrote:

[quote=“Trxkin, post:5, topic:355972”]Name:Camrin
Contact: msn: czar101@hotmail.com
AGE:14
How Long you’ve been experience on how to do it: I’ve been a coder ever sense i was 8. So bout 6 years. I can do pretty much anything on a server. I’ve coded bout 4 successful server. Which all 4 have had over 450+ players on all the time.
Extra Info: I’d like to help you code, and make ur server good so players will want to stay. I’m usally on 6-8 hours a day.[/quote]
add me on msn
liamflan06@hotmail.co.uk

Read full topic
